title: Was Sesame Street’s Bert Displayed with Osama bin Laden on Pro-Taliban Posters?
subtitle: The irascible muppet and the terrorist mastermind appeared to be acquaintances on posters carried by pro-Taliban demonstrators.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Bert, the Sesame Street muppet, appeared on posters carried by supporters of Osama bin Laden.
